issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Table trait should support building complete queries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5945](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5945). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
DataFusion 0.13 included a preview Table trait, which provides a DataFrame style method of building a logical query plan, but it was not usable for any real-world queries.

I would now like the trait to support building real queries, especially aggregate queries.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5945?focusedCommentId=16886522) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4875
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4875>
